alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Chautauqua (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 12:14AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CATTARAUGUS...CHAUTAUQUA AND SOUTHWESTERN ALLEGANY COUNTIES THROUGH 100 AM EDT... At 1213 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ashford Hollow to 6 miles east of Clymer. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jamestown, Olean, Salamanca, Allegany State Park, Lakewood, Gowanda, Falconer, Ashford, Allegany, Franklinville, Clymer, Cuba, Long Point State Park, Jamestown West, Weston Mills, Frewsburg, St. Bonaventure, Ashford Hollow, Chautauqua Institution, and Chautauqua. This includes Interstate 86 between exits 6 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
